problem.markdown: Which of the statements below is true about IPv6? ( ) IPv6 is the 6th version of "Intellectual Property." ( ) IPv6 is significantly faster than IPv4. ( ) IPv6 addresses contain 32 bits. (x) IPv6 was created from a lack of IPv4 addresses.
problem.p: Which of the statements below is true about IPv6?

choicegroup.choice: IPv6 is the 6th version of "Intellectual Property."
IPv6 is significantly faster than IPv4.
IPv6 was created from a lack of IPv4 addresses.
